languages.text: {n}Шепчущий сонм голосов вырывается из горла птицы, щекочет уши, вползает в рот и нос.{/n} "Истинное Дитя Рассвета, что жаждет держать в руке нити будущего... ты просишь о многом, и за это придется отдать многое. Но желание чемпиона — мое желание".

{n}A whispering host of voices erupts from the raven's throat, caressing your ears, slithering into your mouth and nose.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who craves to take hold of the threads of the future... You ask for much, and great will be the price to pay. But the champion's desire is my desire."
languages.original_text: {n}Шепчущий сонм голосов вырывается из горла птицы, щекочет уши, вползает в рот и нос.{/n} "Истинное Дитя Рассвета, что жаждет держать в руке нити будущего... ты просишь о многом, и за это придется отдать многое. Но желание чемпиона — мое желание".

You ask for much, and great will be the price to pay. But the champion's desire is my desire."

languages.text: {n}Ein flüsternder Stimmenchor dringt aus der Kehle des Raben, umschmeichelt deine Ohren, dringt in deinen Mund, deine Nase.{/n} "Ein wahres Kind der Dämmerung, das die Fäden der Zukunft kontrollieren möchte ... Ihr verlangt viel, und der Preis dafür wird hoch sein. Aber der Wunsch des Champions ist auch mein Wunsch."
languages.original_text: {n}A whispering host of voices erupts from the raven's throat, caressing your ears, slithering into your mouth and nose.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who craves to take hold of the threads of the future... You ask for much, and great will be the price to pay. But the champion's desire is my desire."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein flüsternder Stimmenchor dringt aus der Kehle des Raben, umschmeichelt deine Ohren, dringt in deinen Mund, deine Nase.{/n} "Ein wahres Kind der Dämmerung, das die Fäden der Zukunft kontrollieren möchte ... Ihr verlangt viel, und der Preis dafür wird hoch sein. Aber der Wunsch des Champions ist auch mein Wunsch."

languages.text: {n}Un concert de murmures jaillit du gosier de la corneille. Il caresse vos oreilles, se glisse dans votre bouche et votre nez.{/n} « {mf|Un|Une} véritable enfant de l'Aube qui brûle de prendre en main les fils de l'avenir... Vous en demandez beaucoup et devrez vous attendre à payer le prix fort, mais le désir {mf|du champion|de la championne} est aussi le mien. »
languages.original_text: {n}A whispering host of voices erupts from the raven's throat, caressing your ears, slithering into your mouth and nose.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who craves to take hold of the threads of the future... You ask for much, and great will be the price to pay. But the champion's desire is my desire."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un concert de murmures jaillit du gosier de la corneille. Il caresse vos oreilles, se glisse dans votre bouche et votre nez.{/n} « {mf|Un|Une} véritable enfant de l'Aube qui brûle de prendre en main les fils de l'avenir... Vous en demandez beaucoup et devrez vous attendre à payer le prix fort, mais le désir {mf|du champion|de la championne} est aussi le mien. »

languages.text: {n}无数声音构成的低语声从渡鸦的喉咙里涌了出来，爱抚着你的耳朵，滑入你的口鼻。{/n}“真正的黎明之子，渴望握住未来的丝线……你的要求很多，也要付出很大代价。不过，勇士的愿望就是我的愿望。”
languages.original_text: {n}A whispering host of voices erupts from the raven's throat, caressing your ears, slithering into your mouth and nose.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who craves to take hold of the threads of the future... You ask for much, and great will be the price to pay. But the champion's desire is my desire."

traits.locale_text: {n}无数声音构成的低语声从渡鸦的喉咙里涌了出来，爱抚着你的耳朵，滑入你的口鼻。{/n}“真正的黎明之子，渴望握住未来的丝线……你的要求很多，也要付出很大代价。不过，勇士的愿望就是我的愿望。”

languages.text: {n}Un coro de susurros estalla de la garganta del cuervo, acariciando tus oídos e introduciéndose en tu boca y tu nariz.{/n} «Un{mf||a} verdader{mf|o|a} Vástago del Amanecer, con la voluntad de controlar los hilos del futuro... Mucho es lo que pides, y mayor será el precio a pagar. Pero el deseo de{mf|l| la} campe{mf|ón|ona} es mi deseo».
languages.original_text: {n}A whispering host of voices erupts from the raven's throat, caressing your ears, slithering into your mouth and nose.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who craves to take hold of the threads of the future... You ask for much, and great will be the price to pay. But the champion's desire is my desire."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un coro de susurros estalla de la garganta del cuervo, acariciando tus oídos e introduciéndose en tu boca y tu nariz.{/n} «Un{mf||a} verdader{mf|o|a} Vástago del Amanecer, con la voluntad de controlar los hilos del futuro... Mucho es lo que pides, y mayor será el precio a pagar. Pero el deseo de{mf|l| la} campe{mf|ón|ona} es mi deseo».

languages.text: {n}レイヴンの喉から囁く声の群列が湧き上がり、あなたの耳を愛撫し、口や鼻から滑り込んでいく。{/n}「真の暁の子よ、未来の糸をつかむことを望むか…求めるものは大きく、その対価もまた大きい。しかし、勇者の望みは私の望みでもある」
languages.original_text: {n}A whispering host of voices erupts from the raven's throat, caressing your ears, slithering into your mouth and nose.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who craves to take hold of the threads of the future... You ask for much, and great will be the price to pay. But the champion's desire is my desire."

traits.locale_text: {n}レイヴンの喉から囁く声の群列が湧き上がり、あなたの耳を愛撫し、口や鼻から滑り込んでいく。{/n}「真の暁の子よ、未来の糸をつかむことを望むか…求めるものは大きく、その対価もまた大きい。しかし、勇者の望みは私の望みでもある」

languages.text: {n}Kuzgunun gırtlağından fısıltı korosu yükseliyor, kulaklarını okşuyor, ağzına ve burnuna süzülüyor.{/n} "Geleceğin ipliklerini eline almak isteyen gerçek bir Şafak Evladı... Çok şey talep ediyorsun, bedeli de büyük olacak. Lakin müdafinin arzusu, benim de arzumdur."
languages.original_text: {n}A whispering host of voices erupts from the raven's throat, caressing your ears, slithering into your mouth and nose.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who craves to take hold of the threads of the future... You ask for much, and great will be the price to pay. But the champion's desire is my desire."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kuzgunun gırtlağından fısıltı korosu yükselir, kulaklarını okşar, ağzına ve burnuna süzülür.{/n} "Geleceğin ipliklerini eline almak isteyen gerçek bir Şafak Evladı... Çok şey talep ediyorsun ve bedeli de büyük olacak. Lakin müdafinin arzusu, benim de arzumdur."
